title: Don't play League with your friends while you're drunk!
body: According to my other friends on skype last night, our friend got pissy with me because I didn't save him from the botlane's Leblanc even though he knew she was coming to kill him in his JG. But he stayed to try and get the Red Buff's little minions. RIP.  I still haven't heard from him yet today :')

replies.body:
Haha omg.

 I had a friend like that once, I was playing with my flatmates and we unanimously decided not to invite her to a game, due to the fact her laptop is from the 90's so she lags **a lot **. We were all tryharding to win a game and its really hard to do when someone is dc every 2 mins. She ended up sending some really really hateful stuff about me to the other guys through client (even to this day they wont tell me what she said about me). In the end she blocked me and as a direct result was banned from our flat and had no-one to play league with.

I'm sorry to hear that! I guess you're part of the #Permanently Block Listed club huh? :P  

It's ok we have a good time here ;)
No you had it right to begin with you get drunk so you don't care what they say and just laugh at them
